name: Exploration of Xianshan
description:
It's an interesting game.

You can pick up a lot of guns when you come here.

There are some zombies nearby.

Control the direction. Kill them with your gun!

Of course, while killing zombies,

You can also climb mountains,

Look at the sea in the distance,

Mountains in the distance

And the beautiful scenery nearby.



Operation mode





Right click the target



WASD motion control




Left mouse button attack




Mouse control direction




E loading weapons
